about_the_game:
*The full version of the game (sold separately) is required to use this content. If necessary, please install the latest software patch(es).

●Description
Spicy (Special) Gem Assortment
The Spicy (Special) Gem Assortment Set is for when you find yourself in need of a more powerful armor or weapons. These special gems can be used to obtain weapons with higher ranks and enhancements.
*The purchase of this product is limited to once per account. Please note that multiple purchases are not possible.

The following items are included:
-Incremental Gem x10
-Intensification Gem x5
-Enhancement Gem x10
--
Total gems: 25

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Core i5-2510E 3.1GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 660
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Onboard
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Core i5-7300U 3.5GHz
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 960
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Onboard
